Detailed Description

Class ImageRefContainer implements a media container for images only.

BOOLEAN ImageRefContainer::Add (  MediaRefPtr &  media_ref,
BOOLEAN  free = TRUE
)  [virtual]
 

Adds the image of the media reference and a thumbnail of it if the image size is larger than the defined size for thumbnails.

BOOLEAN ImageRefContainer::Delete (  MediaRefPtr &  media_ref,
BOOLEAN  delete_file = FALSE
)  [virtual]
 

If a thumbnail was created for the image the thumbnail's file is deleted regardless of parameter delete_file.
